attributes.action: Prioritise water utility workers for Covid 19 Vaccines
attributes.additional_details: Water utilities workers are frontline, they attend emergencies and may not always know where they will have to work. Keep our country safe by protecting these vital frontline workers.
attributes.background: Water utilty workers have been working as keyworkers providing the country with the greatest resource we need to fight this pandemic, clean water. These keyworkers have to respond to emergencies in houses, schools, shops, restaurants, hospitals,  highways....the list goes on.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568791

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
